<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.OAuthGoogleOfflineAccess</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Enables OAuth 2.0 provider offline access to Google account</description> <name>OAuthGoogleOfflineAccess</name> <script><![CDATA[var OAuthGoogleOfflineAccess = Class.create(); OAuthGoogleOfflineAccess.prototype = Object.extendsObject(OAuthUtil, {
initialize: function() { },
preprocessAuthCode: function(requestParamMap) { requestParamMap.put('access_type', 'offline'); requestParamMap.put('approval_prompt', "force"); },
type: 'OAuthGoogleOfflineAccess' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2015-04-03 23:30:59</sys_created_on> <sys_id>41afea00eb133100469a20425206fe6e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>OAuthGoogleOfflineAccess</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Email - OAUTH support for IMAP and SMTP" source="com.glide.email.oauth">dda6e7992f540110d8a4d5f62799b639</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_41afea00eb133100469a20425206fe6e</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2015-06-10 16:04:34</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>352</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
